item.title: About Us
item.description: Company Name PINNACLE POLYMERS. E-65 /2 MIDC, Ranjangaon ,Tal- Shirur, Dist.-Pune 412 220 Established in December 2020 Former / Managing Director Managing Director of Pinnacle Polymers Mr. Ram Gore is having 24+ years of rich experience in Plastic, Rubber ,Polyurethanes in core technical filed, he has handled many green field projects in Plastic, Rubber and PU. Closely working in the filed of production, process, quality ,QMS , NPD ,commercials ,finance other business operations & proved many success stories & matrix .
